panels.description:
Total user and system CPU time spent in seconds.

**Type:** *counter*
panels.title: process_cpu_seconds_total

panels.description:
Number of bytes transmitted by the process over the network.

**Type:** *counter*
panels.title: process_network_transmit_bytes_total

panels.description:
Number of bytes received by the process over the network.

**Type:** *counter*
panels.title: process_network_receive_bytes_total

panels.description:
The number of connections currently in use.

**Type:** *gauge*
panels.title: go_sql_in_use_connections

panels.description:
The total time blocked waiting for a new connection.

**Type:** *counter*
panels.title: go_sql_wait_duration_seconds_total

panels.description:
Number of heap bytes allocated and currently in use, same as go_memstats_alloc_bytes. Equals to /memory/classes/heap/objects:bytes.

**Type:** *gauge*
panels.title: go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes

panels.description:
Number of heap bytes that are in use. Equals to /memory/classes/heap/objects:bytes + /memory/classes/heap/unused:bytes

**Type:** *gauge*
panels.title: go_memstats_heap_inuse_bytes

panels.description:
Number of heap bytes waiting to be used. Equals to /memory/classes/heap/released:bytes + /memory/classes/heap/free:bytes.

**Type:** *gauge*
panels.title: go_memstats_heap_idle_bytes

panels.description:
Count of events that have been observed for the base metric (A summary of the wall-time pause (stop-the-world) duration in garbage collection cycles.)

**Type:** *counter*
panels.title: go_gc_duration_seconds_count

panels.description:
A summary of the wall-time pause (stop-the-world) duration in garbage collection cycles.

**Type:** *summary*
panels.title: go_gc_duration_seconds

panels.description:
Total sum of all observed values for the base metric (A summary of the wall-time pause (stop-the-world) duration in garbage collection cycles.)

**Type:** *counter*
panels.title: go_gc_duration_seconds_sum

panels.description:
The number of concurrent API requests.

**Type:** *gauge*
panels.title: coderd_api_concurrent_requests

panels.description:
Cumulative counters for the observation buckets (Latency distribution of requests in seconds.)

**Type:** *counter*
panels.title: coderd_api_request_latencies_seconds_bucket

panels.description:
The total number of processed API requests

**Type:** *counter*
panels.title: coderd_api_requests_processed_total

panels.description:
The time taken to receive a message from a pubsub event channel

**Type:** *gauge*
panels.title: coder_pubsub_receive_latency_seconds

panels.description:
The time taken to send a message into a pubsub event channel

**Type:** *gauge*
panels.title: coder_pubsub_send_latency_seconds
